long_description: The Timbuk2 Haight Laptop Daypack exudes a mellow mood and pairs nostalgic 1980s styling with modern features. Leather zipper pulls, chunky zippers, throwback color blocking, and a retro Timbuk2 woven label place this pack squarely in the '80s. Making it modern are a 15 in. laptop pocket, comfortable, adjustable shoulder straps, and a U-lock pocket. External side pocket with bungee tightener can hold your water bottle instead of a U-lock if you're not into cycling. Front square storage area has a diagonal zipper pocket (think sunglasses), and a vertical side zipper pocket large enough for sandals. Side compression straps tighten or expand the roomy main compartment to manage your load. Multiple organizer pockets keep electronics, pens and other small things in line. The retro-look Timbuk2 Haight Laptop Daypack is perfect for cross-campus treks or cross-country travel.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Haight Laptop Daypack exudes a mellow mood and pairs nostalgic 1980s styling with modern features.
